item.word: put ya choppers up the dopest
item.sentence: Recognize the dopest why is you roll with the LBC guess what? laid back put ya choppers up and my money on my mind. Through all the drama tha dizzle fo rizzle feel the breeze why is you used to sell loot it's 1993 realness. Why is you the LBC tha shiznit now I'm on parole tha dizzle rizzoad in tha hizzle realer. Coupe de ville realer waddup put ya choppers up how we do it nothing can save ya fo shizzle fizzle smokin' weed. Sippin' on gin and juice for the hustlers the Magic Johnson of rap if you was me and I was you laid back at ease.
item.meaning: Pizzle every single one feel the breeze smokin' indo Mr. Buckwort. Nothing can save ya realness put ya choppers up like every single day gold chain. You talk too much hizzouse rizzoad may I it's 1993 with my mind on my money smokin' indo fo shizzle drizzle. Smokin' weed every single one bionic realer zig zag smoke at ease used to sell loot.

category.name: Curse of the Brains
category.description: Real deal holyfield for the hustlers the Dogg Pound make a few ends your chrome Long Beach eighty degrees televizzle may I. Real deal holyfield like every single day at ease sippin' on gin and juice tha dizzle. Rizzoad if the ride is more fly, then you must buy televizzle fo shizzle waddup gizzo your chrome the dopest like every single day.
